data.name: AbuIntro
data.value: Absorption-biological units (ABUs) are designed to remove volatile organic gaseous pollutants (phenol, formaldehyde, triethylamine, benzol, acrolein, cyanides, ammonia, methanol, dust, tarry substances aerosols, etc.) from the ventilation air of industrial enterprises.

data.name: AbuOperationDescription
data.value: Diagram and description of the absorption-biological unit

data.name: AbuOperationDetailsOne
data.value: Harmful substances are captured in the scrubber with the help of a water absorbent, and they are neutralized (oxidized to CO2 and H2O) in the bioreactor.

data.name: AbuOperationDetailsThree
data.value: Microorganisms (concentrated biomass) are supplied into the bioreactor once before ABU launch.

data.name: AbuOperationDetailsTwo
data.value: The solution circulates in a closed «scrubber-bioreactor» cycle, with no drain into the sewerage. Purified air is discharged into the atmosphere.

data.name: AbuOprationTitle
data.value: ABU operation principle

data.name: AbuOprationValueA
data.value: А – ventilation air input;

data.name: AbuOprationValueB
data.value: В - ventilation air output;

data.name: AbuOprationValueC
data.value: С – absorption solution;

data.name: AbuOprationValueFour
data.value: 4 – ventilator;

data.name: AbuOprationValueOne
data.value: 1 – scrubber;

data.name: AbuOprationValueThree
data.value: 3 – bioreactor with microorganisms;

data.name: AbuOprationValueTwo
data.value: 2 – pump;

data.name: AbuPurificationDescriptionOne
data.value: The first one is that most harmful volatile organic compounds are soluble in industrial water.

data.name: AbuPurificationDescriptionTwo
data.value: The second one is based on the ability of specially selected and adapted natural microorganisms to use organic and some inorganic substances dissolved in water as the power sources. When microorganisms consume these compounds, these substances get mineralized and water and carbon dioxide are produced as a result.

data.name: AbuPurificationTitle
data.value: ABU employs natural processes to clean ventilation air:

data.name: AbyEfficiencyDescription
data.value: ABU gas purifying equipment is unique in the world by the cumulative index (efficiency, cost effectiveness, environmental friendliness, reliability).

data.name: CompanyIntro
data.value: Industrial Bio Technology company offers absorption-biological units (ABUs)

data.name: Concentration
data.value: at least {0} with an input concentration of {1} mg/m3;
